sql-case.value: ALTER TABLE t_log ADD column1 varchar(10)
ALTER TABLE t_log ADD column1 varchar(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE t_log ADD column1 varchar(10), column2 varchar(10)
ALTER TABLE t_log ADD PRIMARY KEY (id)
ALTER TABLE t_order_item ADD FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
ALTER TABLE t_log ALTER COLUMN column1 varchar(10)
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP COLUMN column1
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP COLUMN column1, column2
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS column1
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP idx_column1, idx_column2
ALTER TABLE t_log DROP IF EXISTS idx_id
